body: I wish the author would have at least continued the ntr plotline, I wanted to see what happened to those guys did the girls beat them up, and also what happened to the ex

Yeah I was waiting for him to fuck the original girl the whole time. To show the ntr girl what she misses out on and to beat up the ntr guys. Feels like an unfinished story tbh. Shouldnt have introduced that plotline if they werent going to finish it.

godly yet I couldn't drive myself to spank it. Plot too good. Wish we'd gotten to see some sort of aftermath with the ex gf, like the dudes that cucked MC getting their ass beat by the wrestlers or the girl seeing him fuck them 10 times as hard as she was gettin it lmfao
